Name: Unrealistic Deadlines
Description: Excessive time pressure can lead to increased cognitive load and stress

Name: Insufficient Training
Description: Lack of necessary skills or knowledge may result in performance anxiety and stress

Name: Poor Communication
Description: Inadequate information sharing can lead to misunderstandings and increased cognitive effort

Name: High Responsibility
Description: Excessive accountability can create fear of failure and increase stress levels

Name: Long Working Hours
Description: Prolonged working hours may result in physical and mental exhaustion
